message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $95. I think it's a great deal!
I'm interested in the product, but $95 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $85.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $85 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $90 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $82.50.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  $82.50 is close, but to be fair I can't go any lower than $87.50.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, but $87.50 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet at this price.
